title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
description: This week, our top comments on the insightful side both come in response to Elon Musk’s plans to turn X into a financial app, and the question of whether you’d trust him with your money. In first place, it’s an anonymous comment: Given how well that Elon complies with consent decrees, I suspect his compliance […]
